name: py-imageio

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Python library for reading and writing image data. Imageio is a Python
library that provides an easy interface to read and write a wide range
of image data, including animated images, video, volumetric data, and
scientific formats. It is cross-platform, runs on Python 2.7 and 3.4+,
and is easy to install.

dependencies.name: ffmpeg
dependencies.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pycortex
dependent_to.description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.

dependent_to.name: py-accimage
dependent_to.description:
An accelerated Image loader and preprocessor leveraging Intel IPP.
accimage mimics the PIL API and can be used as a backend for
torchvision.

dependent_to.name: py-moviepy
dependent_to.description:
MoviePy is a Python module for video editing, which can be used for
basic operations (like cuts, concatenations, title insertions), video
compositing (a.k.a. non-linear editing), video processing, or to create
advanced effects. It can read and write the most common video formats,
including GIF.

dependent_to.name: py-glmsingle
dependent_to.description: A toolbox for accurate single-trial estimates in fMRI time-series data.

dependent_to.name: py-mne
dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-imgaug
dependent_to.description:
A library for image augmentation in machine learning experiments,
particularly convolutional neural networks. Supports the augmentation of
images, keypoints/landmarks, bounding boxes, heatmaps and segmentation
maps in a variety of different ways.

dependent_to.name: halide
dependent_to.description:
Halide is a programming language designed to make it easier to write
high-performance image and array processing code on modern machines.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-image
dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.
